articles.description: Liverpool takes on Everton in the Premier League. Four players are set to be missing in the aftermath of the international break, but Cody Gakpo is in contention.
articles.content: Liverpool is preparing for the return of Premier League action this weekend, as it hosts its Merseyside rival Everton at Anfield. The Reds currently sit in fourth place within the table, after droppi… [+2409 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea vs Arsenal simulated to predict Premier League clash with surprising outcome - Football.London
articles.description: Chelsea and Arsenal go head to head in the Premier League on Saturday, so we simulated the clash to predict the final score
articles.content:

articles.title: Lionel Messi to play in last Inter Miami MLS season game - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Lionel Messi will be on the field on Saturday evening when Inter Miami visits Charlotte FC in his team's last game of the MLS season.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi will travel with Inter Miami CF to Charlotte for the team's final game of the MLS season.
